mapper.insert: insert into db_purchase_temp (SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, INPORTTIME, ORPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, TITLE) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_purchase_temp set PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPORTTIME = #{inporttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORPER = #{orper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, INPORTTIME, ORPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, TITLE from db_purchase_temp where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, PRODUCTID, INPORTTIME, ORPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, TITLE from db_purchase_temp
